snippet.title: Cyberpunk 2077 — Update 2.1 Overview
snippet.description:
Take a look at some of the new features and improvements coming to #Cyberpunk2077 and #PhantomLiberty with Update 2.1! 🔥

Cyberpunk 2077 is available for Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, and PC. Buy now: https://www.cyberpunk.net/buy

Phantom Liberty is a spy-thriller expansion for Cyberpunk 2077. Return as cyber-enhanced mercenary V and embark on a high-stakes mission of espionage and intrigue to save the NUSA President. In the dangerous district of Dogtown, you must forge alliances within a web of shattered loyalties and sinister political machinations. Do you have what it takes to survive?

Learn more: https://www.cyberpunk.net/phantom-liberty

Descriptive text:

Rated M for Mature. Text reads: Radioport. V approaches a crowded crosswalk in Night City. As they stop, the view dims and an interface with available radio stations takes over the screen. As V selects a station, the interface disappears. V crosses the road.

Text reads: Metro. V holds up a metro card in front of a Night City Area Rapid Transit Entrance. A map of the Night City metro appears with a list of available routes to choose from. V selects a station and enters through the gate. A digital glitch covers the screen and V appears inside of a crowded metro cart. They turn around and watch the Night City skyline pass by.

Text reads: New Car - Porsche 911 Cabriolet. Johnny Silverhand, wearing a bulletproof vest and dog tags smokes a cigarette in front of the Porsche. The front half of the car is painted black and features a large Samurai logo decorating its hood. The back half is painted a neon yellow and covered with various stickers.

Text reads: Replayable car races. A street race begins and V weaves their way through bullets and aggressive competitors.

Text reads: New bikes. V drives through a highway on a motorcycle. Text reads: Improved bike combat. Still on the motorcycle, V wields an electrified axe. They throw the axe at an enemy and drive past as the impact creates a cloud of electricity.

Text reads: Hangouts with partners. River, a Native American man with a cybernetic eye approaches V and leans in for a kiss. Judy, a Latina woman with an asymmetrical pink and green haircut, hops onto a pool table. Standing underneath a shower, Kerry Eurodyne washes his hair. He is of Filipino descent, and his arms are covered in full-sleeve tattoos. V strokes the hair of Panam, a biracial woman with black eye makeup and dreadlocks tied up in a messy bun. Next, Panam jumps up and down and waves her hands to the beat.

Text reads: Boss fights improvements. Adam Smasher, a cyborg with red eyes, runs towards V, his Sandevistan cyberware making his movements faster than humanly possible.

Text reads: New bike tricks. V catches some air on a motorcycle and does a full 360 flip.

Overlaid text reads: More to discover. V leans toward a pair of tourist binoculars and looks at Night City through them. A list of new features available in Update 2.1 appear: Metro. Hangouts with partners. Radioport. New vehicles. Improved bike combat. New bike tricks. Replayable car races. Additional car chases. Newly opened highway. Vista points. Boss fights improvements. VFX and lighting improvements. And more to discover.

The Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition logo glitches onto screen. The game is available for Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, and PC.
